title: Supreme Court grants bail to SRS group CMD Anil Jindal in SFIO case
selftext: The Supreme Court on Wednesday granted bail to SRS Group chairperson and managing director Anil Jindal and two of his associates in connection with a ₹770 crore fraud case being probed by Serious Fraud Investigation Officer (SFIO) [Anil Jindal v Serious Fraud Investigation Office].
